fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Limitation of stray animals population in Bulgaria, castration and vaccinations of stray cats and dogs, finding permanent home for strays, raising funds for shelters and fosters.
organisation_name: GIVE HOPE TO A DOG foundation (GIVE HOPE TO A DOG)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Creation of pages on web, facebook, publications, public events, such as table top to collect money for our goals.
goals__remit: Management of shelter for homeless animals, fighting against animal cruelty, spay/neuter, vaccination, deworming and treatment of stray animals and animals in need, feeding of stray animals, organisation of permanent and foster homes, conducting of lectures, seminars, tutorials in order of humanization of the relationship of population to stray animals, encouraging youth volunteers activity, promoting social integration and personal fulfillment.
